title: Mike Rowe And NASA Scientists: Dirty Jobs In Spaaace!
description: Ask Me Another travels to Orlando! We talk to Mike Rowe from Dirty Jobs about his own surprising career path. Plus, NASA scientists Gioia Massa and Melissa Jones dissect science in Hollywood films.
